label: descriptionCode
comment: A code specifying a description of this technical characteristic.
The code specifying a description of a set of inspection instructions.
The code specifying a description of this supply chain trade line item.
The code specifying the description for this sustainability assertion.
The code specifying the description of this material.
The code specifying the description of this product batch.
The code specifying the description of this trade product.

domainIncludes.comment: A statement that user needs of the present are met without compromising the needs of future generations.
Information of an instructive nature that describes how to conduct an inspection.
A group of products considered or dealt with together.
A substance from which something is or could be made.
A collection of information specific to an item being used or reported on for supply chain trade purposes.
A prominent technical attribute or aspect.
Any tangible output or service produced by human or mechanical effort or by a natural process for trade purposes.
